tags: It's just weird not to know that kind of stuff
What is his company up to?
What's her job? Like what is she doing? In the company on a daily basis?
Does he get paid to be Tony's friend?
I mean not to be mean I love him but he isn't much of a bodyguard anymore
What does he get paid for
summary: One question that always comes back to me is: what is Stark industries, like, doing now? I mean it's obviously still running...
body:
One question that always comes back to me is: what is Stark industries, like, doing now? I mean it’s obviously still running but? How? Why? What are they making that keeps them running? Are they selling stuff? What are they selling? Are they developing tech? How is the company doing?

I don’t know, but I wish to. I guess it’ll always be a secret.

summary: A family life in Marvel
title: A family life in Marvel
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2LSVOCQ

by Marstars232

Before the battle of New York the Avengers were getting use to living the easy life at the mansion.Natasha and Clint have been married for a while,Tony figure that out already though.From working at shield for a long while after Clint first saved Nat from being killed.But soon after the long times they spent at Shield and the avengers,Natasha surprisingly finds out she was pregnant.

To be sure if it will happen,she keeps it from the team (expect Clint),but soon the team figure it out on their own and accept to have a minor living with them.But also want to be in a family suited manor for the child too.When the child does come though,Loki appears for revenge for the last time the Avengers ruined his plans and banishes the child from their world.

But after doing so in the process Loki erases everyone that knows of Natasha being pregnant to having the child today and they live out there normal lives.Until the battle of New York when everything is relived to them about the child and in hope wants to come back to live with them.

Words: 932, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

  • Fandoms: The Avengers (Marvel Movies)
  • Rating: Teen And Up Audiences
  • Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings, No Archive Warnings Apply
  • Categories: F/M, Gen
  • Characters: Natasha Romanov (Marvel), Clint Barton, Tony Stark, Thor (Marvel), Steve Rogers, Peter Parker, Pepper Potts, Bruce Banner, Loki (Marvel), Wanda Maximoff, Vision (Marvel), James “Bucky” Barnes, Sam Wilson (Marvel), Scott Lang
  • Relationships: Pepper Potts/Tony Stark, Clint Barton/Natasha Romanov, Jane Foster/Thor, Wanda Maximoff/Vision
  • Additional Tags: Reunions, Protective Avengers, Protective Clint Barton, Protective Natasha Romanov, no civil war, time gaps, Superfamily (Marvel), Other Additional Tags to Be Added, Other Ships Not Mentioned in Tags, Father-Daughter Relationship, Mother-Daughter Relationship, Uncle-Niece Relationship, Aunt-Niece Relationship

summary: Ironstrange - The other you Chapter 6
body:
Ironstrange - The other you Chapter 6

“What´s up with your hands?” Stark asked and sat down on a couch. “I had a car accident yeras ago. This is the best the doctors could do” Stephen explained. “Really? I didn´t read anything about this and how can you still be a surgeon with such tremors?” Tony now wanted to know. The Sorcerer sighted:“Well,I am not. To be honest,I´m probably not the man you were looking for…” “What does this mean?” “I think,what he wants to say is that he is from antoher dimension or something.” a familiar voice commented. Surprised,and with a reply on his tounge the Sorcerer turned around. But he actually was too stunned by Lokis apperenace to say something. The god wore casual clothes,his hair was short and with a cup of tea he leaned against the doorframe. He eyed Stephen curiously and a little grin was on his face. “How do you know?” Tony asked a little bit bewildered. “His magic. You know this is not the first time I meet Strange so I am kind of familiar with his magic,but what I sense from this man is ,maybe not completly but still clearly, different.” Loki explained. “Would you say his magic is stronger or not?” the mechanic questioned interested. Loki thought about it for a second before answering:“The mgic itself is not really stronger,but the one who uses it however…” Now both men looked at the Sorcerer,who felt kind of uncomfortable. “Sit down Doctor Strange. I think we have a lot to talk about.” Stark said with a sly grin. 

“I think you are a smart person Anthony,so you probably know,if I wanted to kill you or anything else,I would have already done it.” commented Strange. Tony sighted. It seems like he couldn´t work in peace today. But what did he honestly expect after bringing an evil version of Stephen home with him. So the mechanic turned around, to face the Doctor again. “Except your are a sadist and like to play with your victims.” “I may be sadistic sometimes,but you can belive me when I say,that I really don´t want to kill you.” “I don´t have any reason to belive or trust you Strange,so I won´t. ” Tony answered and crossed his arms. “What can I do to make you trust me?” Strange asked,smiling sweetly. “Nothing.” was everything the mechanic said. Stephen was now the one, who sighted. He stood up:“Come on,there is a big chance that we will have to spend more than this one day together. Do you want every day to go like this? Do you always want to treat me like your worst enemy,even though I have done nothing to harm you?"  "I…Wong told me what you´ve done! You´ve killed you parents and other people! You are dangerous,so tell me why I shouldn´t treat you as an enemy?” snapped Tony. “Because wouldn´t it be better to have someone like me as your friend? And please don´t start again with the whole ‘you killed people,you´re evil’. Don´t we all have blood on our hands?” questioned Strange,slowly walking towards the other man. Automatically Tony took a step back,but behind him was already a table:“That´s… that´s something total different. Don´t compare me with you!” “Well, prove it! Tell me your story…” demanded Stephen laying a hand on Tonys Arc Reactor.

@cora-devil, @mistressstrange, @ptx-zelda392, @creative-chaos-in-my-head, @grumpyfluffysloth, @rhodeisland101,

blog.name: imagines-and-fandom-trash
blog.title: Imagines and Fandom Trash
blog.description:
Requests are open!
Hello there! You can call me Bones if you want to. I'm just a girl that wants to bring happines to you all. I'll do imagines, one-shots and aesthetics for these fandoms: Percy Jackson and the Olympians, MCU (Marvel), DC, Stranger Things (yeaaah), Star Trek, Star Wars, Twilight, Labyrinth (we don't have much of that here), The X Files, Harry Potter and Supernatural. Feel free to ask me to join some fandoms.

summary: Roller Coaster Ride
title: Roller Coaster Ride
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2O6ujTi

by man_of_vibranium

underoosstark on Tumblr: “Tony Stark probably couldn’t go on any rollercoaster rides because of his heart problems and I don’t know why but this makes me very sad”

But what if Peter Parker didn’t know? What if he got Tony amusement park tickets?

summary: we are searching (but the days are not long enough)
title: we are searching (but the days are not long enough)
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2MdSSx2

by olivemartini

What does the world do, when one of the greatest minds of their generation disappears?
Nothing.
Pepper wants there to be more. She wants the world to stand still, for schools to close and the cars on the street to stop moving, for flags to fly at half mast because he deserved it, deserved to be more than a news story that people stopped listening to after the third day and a conversation piece for women getting their nails done at the salon, for a million of those weapons he built to go off at the exact same time in a thousand gun salute, so loud and sudden that it would shake the ground that people stand on, but that is not what he gets.

Words: 4002, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

Series: Part 25 of All The Lovely Ones Have Scars

  • Fandoms: Iron Man (Movies), Marvel Cinematic Universe, The Avengers (Marvel Movies)
  • Rating: General Audiences
  • Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
  • Categories: F/M
  • Relationships: Pepper Potts/Tony Stark
  • Additional Tags: Angst, Iron Man 1, Pepper while Tony is in afghanistan, Pre-Relationship, Cannon compliant


read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2MdSSx2

blog.name: morgoona-stark
blog.title: "I am... Iron Man"
blog.description:
Tony Stark is the Strongest Avenger| 
Header by @anthonyed

summary: Y'all don't understand I don't think it'll be May who'll be pissed at Tony. One look at him and she'll know how Tony feels, how...
body:
Y'all don’t understand I don’t think it’ll be May who’ll be pissed at Tony. One look at him and she’ll know how Tony feels, how he is going through to the same thing and she is right now, a parent who just lost their kid.

No, it’ll Ned instead, a 15-16 year old teenage kid who’ll charge himself at Tony, demanding to know how he, the Tony Stark, the man the two of them looked up to their entire lives how dare he let them down, how dare he lose Ned’s best friend Peter who looked up to him all throughout his life who Peter thought of as their greatest saviour.

And it’ll only break Tony more.
